## 설치

- [asdf로 런타임 버전 관리하기](/docs/lang/etc/command-line-tools/version/asdf.mdx#플러그인)

```shell
asdf plugin add nodejs
```

## yarn

```shell
npm install -g yarn
```

```shell
yarn install
```

```shell
npx syncyarnlock -s -k
```
